fastformat::sink_output_exception

sink_output_exception Class Reference
[Exceptions]

#include <fastformat/exceptions.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for sink_output_exception:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Exception class that represents the case where a sink has failed to write its output.
